Neighbor Parser

CDP and LLDP Neighbor Parser

Tabulate your Cisco network neighbors

How To Use

  1. Run either show cdp neighbors detail or show lldp neighbors detail on your Cisco device
  2. Copy the text output from the device
  3. Paste the output in the field below
  4. Adjust the neighbor table by
    • Dragging the columns to re-order them
    • Adding/removing columns using the button
  5. Export the neighbor table by
    • Clicking the button to copy tab-seperated data (ready to paste in to a spreadsheet) to your clipboard
    • Clicking the button to download a CSV of the neighbor table

Try It

Copy one [or both] of the examples below and paste it into the "Neighbor Output" field below to convert it to a table

CDP Example: show cdp neighbors detail
LLDP Example: show lldp neighbors detail

Privacy

Neighbor Parser is a 100% client-side application. The website is completely static and sends none of your private data over the internet.

The code is open-source and is published on the GitHub page.

You can use this webpage offline (with no network access) by either:

  1. Using your browser to save this page as a series of files (File > Save as... or equivalent)
  2. Downloading the source repository ZIP file from GitHub, unzipping it, and opening the dist/index.html file with your browser.

Bugs

If you encouter a bug or would like to see a feature added to this web app, please open an issue on the GitHub page.

To contribute features or bug fixes, fork the repo and submit a merge request.
